A long time ago, in a galaxy far far away...

There was a girl. She would do anything for food so her dog could have a better life. That girl is me. If you come across this page and read all these words, please help me, I'm poor. You can scroll through this page to learn more about me before making your hiring decision.

I write bad code and make self-deprecating jokes

My full name is Hoàng Quỳnh Anh. You can read more about me here.

This is my portfolio page. If you are looking for an intern who is willing to learn anything, you come to the right place. I have some experience in web development. You can see my projects below. For more info, you can check my CV or visit my github.

things i made

My not-so-trashy project
This is a website for promoting and joining events I made with my other 2 teammates at FramgiaEdu to learn Ruby and Ruby on Rails. To see what I've done in this project, you can check my cv.
Here is the link to this website. Where to go? Go to my website!

Quyết đê
A simple SaaS website I built under instructors’ training. With this site, users can submit their questions and answer others by voting yes/no. I made this with NodeJS but now I can't even remember what i've learned.

My first project in my entire career
This is a simple platformer game based on the infamous Super Mario Bros to help me learn JavaScript and Phaser. I made this game with my four-member team at Techkids. A bunch of spaghetti code.
